main.bandagedsc: لفافة قماش، تستخدم لإبطاء النزيف، وتثبيت الكسور، ومساعدة التئام الجلد. لا تؤثر على صحة العضلات.
main.ragdsc: قماشة متهالكة ومكومة. يمكن استخدامها كضمادة مؤقتة.
main.sterilizedbandagedsc: لفافة قماش، تستخدم لإبطاء النزيف وتثبيت الكسور ومساعدة التئام الجلد. تكافح العدوى. لا تؤثر على صحة العضلات.
main.plasticbandagedsc: لفافة من مادة صلبة مصنوعة خصيصا، ومصممة لتغطية الجروح وتثبيت الكسور بكفاءة. لا تؤثر على صحة العضلات.
main.musharmdsc: جزء نباتي غير صالح للأكل، ومفيد كضمادة مؤقتة لمرة واحدة.
main.paincreamdsc: زجاجة مليئة بمزيج من الكيماويات والأدوية. تخفف الألم على الفور في المكان التي تستخدم فيه. لا يدوم التأثير.
main.morphinedsc: أفيون قوي. يخفف الألم في جميع أنحاء الجسم، ويبطئ النشاط العقلي. الجرعة الزائدة عند حوالي ٩٠٪.
main.makeshiftlrddsc: جهاز إنعاش موضعي مؤقت. يبدو مثبتا بشريط لاصق. يزيد من صحة العضلات ويقلل بشدة من عدوى الطرف المستخدم عليه، وأي أطراف مجاورة مباشرة.
main.lrddsc: جهاز إنعاش موضعي، مصمم لتوفير رعاية عامة فعّالة للإصابات بسهولة. يعمل على تحسين صحة الأطراف، وإزالة العدوى، وإبطاء النزيف، وتوفير أدوية مسكنة للألم وتطهير الطرف المستخدم عليه، بالإضافة إلى أي أطراف مجاورة.
main.opiumdsc: مادة أفيونية خفيفة نسبيًا. تخفف الألم في جميع أنحاء الجسم، وتبطئ النشاط العقلي. الجرعة الزائدة عند  أكثر من ٢٠٠٪.
main.heroindsc: عقار أفيوني قوي مركب. يسبب النشوة ويسكن الألم بشكل قوي، ولكن من السهل تناول جرعة زائدة منه أو الدخول في أعراض الانسحاب بعده. لا توجد معلومات عن الجرعة... غير صحي على الإطلاق.
main.naloxonedsc: مضاد أفيوني يعالج الجرعات الزائدة من الأفيون. قد ينقذ العلاج السريع حياتك أثناء تناول جرعة زائدة عرضية.
main.naltrexonedsc: دواء يستخدم لعلاج الأمراض العامة مثل الغثيان أو تعاطي الأفيون. يقلل السعادة وقد يسبب القيء.
main.fentanyldsc: أفيون قوية للغاية، أقوى من المورفين بمائة مرة. يخفف الألم في جميع أنحاء الجسم، ويبطئ النشاط العقلي. الجرعة الزائدة عند حوالي ٢٠٪.
main.painkillersdsc: زجاجة تحتوي على مواد أفيونية. تخفف كل الألم لفترة من الوقت بعد الاستخدام. قد تؤدي الجرعة الزائدة إلى فشل الجهاز التنفسي وصعوبة الاستيقاظ.
main.braingrowdsc: زجاجة تحتوي على دواء خاص يتناول عن طريق الفم يحفز نمو المخ. يزيد من سلامة المخ، ولكن غالبًا ما يكون له آثار جانبية خطيرة.
main.autopumpdsc: عند استخدامها، تثبت على الصدر، وتبقي مستوى الأكسجين مناسبا في جسمك، وتوفر الأدرينالين والطاقة لمدة ٥ دقائق، مما قد يمنحك المزيد من الوقت. تستخدم مرة واحدة.
main.antidepressantsdsc: زجاجة من مضادات الإكتئاب القوية. تشعرك بتحسن لبعض الوقت، وتزيد من سعادتك تدريجيا. قد تكون لها آثار جانبية.
main.antibioticsdsc: زجاجة من المضادات الحيوية. تقاوم العدوى في جميع الأطراف، وتقلل العدوى على الفور بنسبة ٨٪ في كل طرف. طعمها سيء.
main.sleepingpillsdsc: زجاجة من حبوب النوم. يبدو اسم العلامة التجارية مخدوش. تجعلك متعبا عند استهلاكها.
main.rosepoddsc: A part of a sand rose. Doesn't spoil. Can be opened.
main.roselightdsc: A bright, far reaching yellow light that came from a sand rose. While it decays fast, it's useful for checking how big a drop is. Also reveals hidden infections if used on a limb.
main.splintdsc: A sturdy board, made to aid fractures. Helps with healing fractures and dislocations.
main.bloodbagdsc: A plastic bag filled with blood, and an auto-injector at the end. Drinking from it is not recommended.
main.bloodbaghumandsc: A plastic bag filled with weirdly-colored blood, and an auto-injector at the end. Probably not healthy.
main.bloodbagemptydsc: A plastic bag with trace amounts of blood in it. Use in the health panel to fill the bag with blood from your body (0.75L) for later use.
main.toolboxdsc: A big, heavy steel box, made to hold tools.
main.medkitdsc: A small box, made to hold medicine.
main.disinfectantdsc: A bottle of antiseptic fluid. Prevents skin wounds from getting infected for a duration, and can help fight off very weakened infections.
main.scrapmetaldsc: Bits and pieces of steel from destroyed machinery. Can be placed down.
main.bloodcrystalsharddsc: Seeps blood into anything it touches. Slowly increases your blood volume up to normal levels while stored on your body.
main.soothingcrystalsharddsc: It has a calming aura to it. Slowly increases happiness while stored on your body.
main.reliefcrystalsharddsc: You feel a little numb holding it... Decreases pain while stored on your body.
main.turbulentcrystalsharddsc: It vibrates with energy. Increases jump height while stored on your body.
main.oxygencrystalsharddsc: It's bubbling away slowly, releasing oxygen into anything around it... Increases stamina regeneration while stored on your body.
main.emissivecrystalsharddsc: Glows brightly, for a time. Useful as a light source while it lasts.
main.digestioncrystalsharddsc: It feels as if it's taking matter out of your body... Decreases sickness while stored on your body.
main.geofruitdsc: Basic, but tasty fruit. Grows on geo-trees. Low in calories, negligibly refreshing and decays fast.
main.stonefruitcloseddsc: A hard green fruit stuck to a hard, gray part of its plant. You need to seperate it using your teeth first.
main.stonefruitopendsc: A hard green fruit with a neutral taste and medium fat content. It's very dry, you'll probably be thirsty after it.
main.bananadsc: A tasty yellow fruit, seemingly from another planet.
main.burgerdsc: A big, tasty snack. Fills both your tummy and soul!
main.pizzaslicedsc: A slice of baked pizza. Very tasty, filling and fattening!
main.bucketofchickendsc: A bunch of chicken legs in a bucket. Very filling.
main.steakdsc: A big, nicely cooked and prepared piece of meat. Filling, fattening and tasty!
main.cookiesdsc: A pack of small, baked sweet snacks. Tasty, but not the healthiest.
main.chipsdsc: A pack of thin, baked slices of potato. Tasty, but not the healthiest.
main.cerealdsc: A box of generic cereal. Not exactly fun to eat dry, but it's filling and not repulsive. Slightly increases thirst.
main.hardcandydsc: A pack of small, hard candy. Tasty, but not filling.
main.fleshchunkdsc: A giant, very fatty chunk of flesh. Must've came from something big. Very filling and fattening.
main.candybardsc: A nice, tasty candy bar. Lasts long, but not very filling. Might make you sick if overeaten.
main.chocolatebardsc: A bar of unpackaged chocolate. Tasty, but you can't digest it well.
main.waterbottledsc: Plastic bottle with water in it.
main.milkdsc: A white liquid food produced by the mammary glands of mammals, in a carton. Tasty and filling!
main.chocolatemilkdsc: A type of flavoured milk made by mixing it with cocoa solids. Very sweet and tasty, but toxic for your species. Increases happiness, consume with caution.
main.ketchupdsc: A table condiment with a sweet and sour flavor. A little disgusting to drink.
main.waterjugdsc: Big, heavy plastic bottle with water in it. Stores a lot, and doesn't spoil.
main.bleachdsc: Chemical product used to remove color from fiber, or to disinfect. Can be used to disinfect wounds, at the cost of damaging the limb. Drinking is lethal.
main.energydrinkdsc: A tasty, caffeinated drink to give you a small boost of stamina and energy. Considerably toxic for your species, drink with caution.
main.coffeedsc: A beverage brewed from roasted coffee beans. Tasty and stimulating, but rather toxic due to the caffeine content.
main.soupdsc: A closed bowl of unidentifiable soup. Tasty and filling with high water content!
main.sodabottledsc: A tasty, sugary drink, packed in a large bottle.
main.applejuicedsc: A carton of fruit juice made by the maceration and pressing of an apple. Tasty!
main.lemonadedsc: A jar containing a sweetened lemon-flavored milk. Tasty!
main.iceteadsc: A bottle of cold, sweetened decaffeinated tea. Tasty!
main.sodacandsc: A tasty, sugary drink, packed in a small can.
main.alcoholdsc: Glass bottle with unlabeled alcohol in it. Drinkable, but your body can't digest it well at all. Can disinfect wounds when used on a wounded limb.
main.foliagedsc: Generic alien plantlife. Barely edible, with a dissatisfying taste. Might make you sick. Decays fast.
main.glowplantfruitdsc: Bioluminescent and inedible. Has moderately dangerous toxins inside; good at killing bacteria. Reduces infection on the limb it's used on. And, a basic light source.
main.flashlightdsc: Lights up a large area infront of it, but slowly loses battery. Use to change mode.
main.nutrientbardsc: Solid, edible bar of pure nutrients and calories. Neutral taste, and doesn't spoil.
main.primitivediggingtooldsc: A piece of sharp, heavy metal on a stick. Better at digging than claws.
main.shoveldsc: A tool specially crafted to efficiently displace soil and other loose materials. While you haven't seen one of these before in your life, using it isn't exactly a science.
main.woodshoveldsc: A tool specially crafted to efficiently displace soil and other loose materials. Made with a brittle, yet light material.
main.pitchforkdsc: An agricultural tool used to pitch loose material, such as hay, straw, manure, or leaves. Made of steel.
main.woodpitchforkdsc: An agricultural tool used to pitch loose material, such as hay, straw, manure, or leaves. Made of wood.
main.minilaserdrilldsc: A small, consumer-grade laser drill. Not the best at digging, but uses no stamina.
main.heavydrilldsc: A big, heavy, mechanical handheld drill. Very efficient, though lacks range.
main.pickaxedsc: A tool specially crafted to dig rock. Very efficient at removing terrain, though slow.
main.sledgehammerdsc: A tool with a large, flat metal head, attached to a long handle. Not made for digging.
main.woodpickaxedsc: A pickaxe made out of a particularly dissapointing material. Efficient at removing terrain, but slow and brittle.
main.wooddiggingtooldsc: A piece of sharpened wood on a stick. Barely better at digging than claws.
main.stickdsc: You're not sure where it came from. Stabbing it into the ground repeatedly is likely negligibly more efficient than clawing at it unarmed.
main.machetedsc: A big, broad metal blade. You feel uneasy holding it.
main.sickledsc: A metal tool with a curved blade, made to harvest crops or cut through vegetation.
main.woodsickledsc: A wooden tool with a curved blade, made to harvest crops or cut through vegetation.
main.rakedsc: Used for softening soil, along other things. Makes you feel like a farmer!
main.clawsdsc: Even though it looks like a toy, it's scarily tough and sharp. You feel like you'd look cool holding it.
main.troweldsc: Primitive gardening tool, made of wood and metal. Probably better than using your claws.
main.woodtroweldsc: Primitive gardening tool, made of wood. Probably better than using your claws...?
main.experimentfleshdsc: A ripped piece of flesh from one of your own. Filling, but sickening.
main.internalorgansdsc: A solid compressed ball of displaced internal organs, you can see an orange eyeball sticking out. Looks like they came from a creature sized closely to you. Filling, but horribly disgusting and sickening.
main.blobfleshdsc: Oddly gooey piece of flesh. Filling and tasty! Might make you minorly sick.
main.cactusfleshdsc: Sweet, high in water content and prickly. Tasty and hydrating, but it hurts to eat.
main.watchdsc: Periodically tells you useful info (bleeding time, hidden infections, weight changes, etc). When used, displays run time and temperature. Having a pocket buddy is comforting!
main.mp3playerdsc: Surprising it still works. Plays/skips a song when used.
main.mushpeardsc: A blue plant part, made to distribute water. Barely edible, with a weird weight-absorbing property and off-putting taste. Seems to have trace opiate concentration.
main.mushtaildsc: The end tail of a mushplant. Contains a chemical which can instantly knock someone out for a while, with a visible mood increase afterwards. Odd. No nutritional value.
main.mushballdsc: A round, edible, bubble-like watery fruit. Looks and feels a little disgusting, but has high water content. Decays very fast.
main.duffelbagdsc: A decently sized bag made of fabric.
main.bikehelmetdsc: A helmet designed to reduce the severity of impacts to the head. Reduces head injuries from falls.
main.headlampdsc: A little flashlight, made to be strapped onto your forehead. Loses battery over time.
main.dustmaskdsc: A slightly sturdy mask that covers your mouth. Offers minor head protection.
main.safetyglassesdsc: A sturdy pair of plastic glasses. Offers minor head protection.
main.autozoomgogglesdsc: A pair of goggles that have the ability to zoom in the user's vision to see farther.
main.blindfolddsc: A black piece of cloth to cover your eyes with. Offers slight protection, but closes your character's eyes.
main.balaclavadsc: A thick, padded piece of cloth to go around your skull. Offers minor protection and decent isolation.
main.latexglovesdsc: A pair of simple latex gloves. Offers minor isolation from the elements.
main.fannypackdsc: A small bag made to be put on your belly.
main.bellyarmordsc: A big piece of metal, made to be strapped on your abdomen. Provides great protection, and some isolation.
main.beltdsc: A leather belt to go over your belly. You could attach something to it.
main.metabolismchipdsc: A chip that slightly increases your metabolism, making your limbs regenerate, using more hunger to do so.
main.heatingchipdsc: A chip that increases your body temperature considerably.

buildings.bioterminaldsc: محطة كمبيوتر أسفلها لوحة مكتوب عليها "أدخل عينة من الحمض النووي البشري للاستمرار..."
buildings.BloodCrystaldsc: يبدو رطباً بسائل أصفر، يطلقه في أي شيء حوله.
buildings.cactusdsc: فوق، قيل لك إن هذه الأشياء من المفترض أن تكون خضراء. على الأقل لم يكذبوا بشأن كونها شائكة.
buildings.coildsc: جيد لشوي أي شيء موصل للكهرباء على الفور.
buildings.EmissiveCrystaldsc: ينبعث منها ضوء ساطع إلى حد ما.
buildings.geotreedsc: إنها طرية! تحتوي على أشكال هندسية تشبه أوراق الشجر.
buildings.glowplantdsc: نبات أخضر مضيء حيويًا. يبدو أنه لا يتأثر بالبيئة المحيطة.
buildings.leadbushdsc: تنمو عليها قطع من المعادن الثقيلة. رغم أنها تبدو كالنبات، إلا أنها في الواقع حيوان!
buildings.lifepodchestdsc: غالبا تحتوي على معدات نجاة أساسية.
buildings.medicalstationdsc: مع أنها تبدو وكأنها غالبا فقدت غرضها بحلول الآن، ولكن لا يزال بإمكانها أن تمنحك جرعة قوية لمرة واحدة.
buildings.sandrosedsc: نبات جميل بغرابة، مع بعض الأشكال المستطيلة الكبيرة التي تنمو عليه.
buildings.scrapeaterdsc: يوجد عليه ملصق يقول "أدخل خردة للفتح"، مع شاشة صغيرة بجانبه تعرض "<>%".
buildings.shuttledoordsc: قطعة معدن كبيرة لإبقاء أشياء الخارج بالخارج وأشياء الداخل بالداخل.
buildings.stoneplantdsc: إنها كتلة من مادة صلبة شبه حجرية مع كتل خضراء طرية ملتصقة بها.

moodles.deaddsc: فقدان دائم، وكامل، ولا رجعة فيه لوظائف المخ. لقد تركت هذا العالم خلفك، مثلك مثل الآخرين.
moodles.braindamage3dsc: بالكاد تتشبث بالحياة، وتعاني من تلف شديد في المخ، أنت كيس جوافة، التعافي غير محتمل.
moodles.braindamage2dsc: تعاني من إعاقة ذهنية كبيرة، وبالكاد تقدر على التفكير بذكاء والبقاء واعيًا، كما تعاني من تلف خطير في الدماغ.
moodles.braindamage1dsc: مصاب بخلل عقلي نتيجة تلف في المخ، انت تشعر بارتباك غريب...
moodles.cantbreathedsc: تختنق! فقدان الوعي والموت وشيكان إذا لم يتم العلاج.
moodles.oxygen1dsc: انخفاض نسبة الأكسجين في الدم، ارتباك طفيف، مع بشرة مطاطية، شيء ما خاطئ...
moodles.oxygen2dsc: لا يوجد ما يكفي من الأكسجين الذي يتدفق إلى الجسم، تشعر بالدوار والتخدر في الأطراف، شيء ما خاطئ للغاية.
moodles.oxygen3dsc: فقدت الوعي، الأنسجة تحرم من الأكسجين، تلف الدماغ وشيك.
moodles.oxygen4dsc: توقف القلب، المخ يموت بسبب نقص الأكسجين، جسدك بالكامل يتوقف عن العمل بسرعة.
moodles.pain2dsc: تشعر بألم كبير، الحزن يتصاعد ببطء.
moodles.pain3dsc: نصف واعي، ذهنك مشوش بسبب الألم الشديد، الحزن يتصاعد.
moodles.pain4dsc: ألم حاد محطم للعقل، حركة ضعيفة، انت تفضل الموت في هذه اللحظة. الحزن يتزايد بسرعة.
moodles.caveticksdsc: مئات من المخلوقات الصغيرة التي تشبه العناكب تزحف حولك وتعض جسمك. الشيء الوحيد الذي يدور في ذهنك الآن هو الصراخ. يمكن للمطهرات محاربتها!
moodles.overdose2dsc: مسترخٍ وهادئ جدا، لكن رئتيك تشعران بثقل. تشعر بالتعب أكثر من المعتاد. هذا شعور جيد جدًا، حتى الآن...
moodles.overdose3dsc: التنفس صعب، لكن عقلك في حالة من النشوة. هذا ليس صحيا أبدا، لو كان فقط بإمكانه أن يستمر إلى الأبد...
moodles.overdose4dsc: فشل في الجهاز التنفسي. أنت تغادر هذا العالم في حالة من النشوة بسبب المخدرات. تلف الدماغ والموت وشيكان.
moodles.withdrawal2dsc: جسدك يحتاج إلى جرعة أخرى. أنت تريد التقيؤ... هذا شعور سيء للغاية. يوصى بالعلاج.
moodles.withdrawal3dsc: أنت تكافح من أجل الحفاظ على تماسكك، وترتجف، وتبحث يائسًا عن أي نوع من الراحة. هذا شعور فظيع. العلاج ضروري.
moodles.withdrawal4dsc: جسدك يفشل في الاستمرار بدون الأفيون التي أصبح معتمدًا عليها بشدة. قلبك يكافح لضخ الأكسجين إلى الجسم، مما يؤدي إلى تلف الدماغ بسبب نقص الأكسجين أثناء نوبة يائسة.
moodles.bleeding1dsc: الدم يتدفق من جرح صغير نسبيًا، لا يوجد خطر مباشر.
moodles.bleeding2dsc: الدم يتدفق من جرح كبير نسبيا. من غير المحتمل أن يكون مميتًا إذا كنت بصحة جيدة. يوصى بالعلاج.
moodles.bleeding3dsc: الجسد يخرج كمية كبيرة من الدم. من المحتمل أن يكون ذلك مميتًا إذا لم يتم علاجه. العلاج مطلوب.
moodles.bleeding4dsc: الدم يتدفق منك كالماء الخارج من خرطوم إطفاء الحرائق. الموت وشيك والعلاج في غاية الأهمية!
moodles.lowbloodvolume1dsc: فقدان بسيط للدم. تشعر بقليل من الضعف، مع شحوب الجلد تحت فرائك.
moodles.lowbloodvolume2dsc: ضعف واضطراب بسبب فقدان الدم. تشعر بتوعك شديد. يوصى بالعلاج.
moodles.lowbloodvolume3dsc: تفقد كمية كبيرة من الدم، وبالكاد تزال واعيا. الرؤية غير واضحة... العلاج مطلوب.
moodles.lowbloodvolume4dsc: فقدان الدم مهدد للحياة، على وشك الإغماء. لحظات حتى فشل القلب بالكامل. الموت وشيك.
moodles.highbloodvolume1dsc: تشعر بعدم الارتياح، وضغط الدم مرتفع.
moodles.highbloodvolume2dsc: الجسد منتفخ، ضغط الدم مرتفع، تشعر بالدوار مع صداع.
moodles.highbloodvolume3dsc: منتفخ بشدة، ضغط الدم مرتفع للغاية، بالكاد تستطيع الوقوف أو التفكير.
moodles.highbloodvolume4dsc: هناك ألم رهيب في صدرك... العلامات الحيوية تتلاشى. حجم الدم والضغط مرتفعان للغاية.
moodles.exertion2dsc: مجهد بشكل غير مريح، وتكافح من أجل الحركة والعمل. (<>٪)
moodles.exertion3dsc: بالكاد قادر على الحركة، مجهد للغاية. (<>٪)
moodles.brokenbonedsc: لقد كسرت شيئا. حاول ألا تستخدم الطرف المصاب، واسترح قدر الإمكان. يوصى بالعلاج بشدة.
moodles.dislocationdsc: لقد خلع شيء ما. حاول عدم استخدام الطرف المصاب، وابحث عن طريقة لإصلاحه. يوصى بالعلاج.
moodles.brokenneckdsc: رقبتك مكسورة، الحبل الشوكي لم يُقطع، لكن أي قدر من الحركة سيكون مؤلمًا. أضعف جسديًا من الرقبة إلى الأسفل. الأكل مؤلم.
moodles.brokenribsdsc: لقد كُسِرت أضلاعك، مما يجعل التنفس مؤلمًا وصعبًا للغاية. أنت ترجو ألا يكون أي منها قد ثقب رئتيك. ضعفت قوة ذراعك.
moodles.dislocatedjawdsc: خُلع فكك، مما يعيق كلامك ويجعل تناول أي شيء مؤلمًا للغاية.
moodles.dislocatedspinedsc: عمودك الفقري مخلوع، الحبل الشوكي لم يقطع، لكن تحريك جسمك على الإطلاق مؤلم للغاية. أضعف جسديًا من الخصر إلى الأسفل.
moodles.infected1dsc: مكان العدوى متورم ودافئ. العلاج مطلوب. ابحث عن شيء يمكنه قتل الأجسام الغريبة.
moodles.infected2dsc: يتسرب صديد داكن من مكان العدوى، ويزداد التورم. العلاج مطلوب.
moodles.infected3dsc: تنتشر العدوى عبر الطرف بسرعة وبشكل مؤلم. تحتمل الإصابة بالإنتان. تحتاج إلى علاج عاجل.
moodles.infected4dsc: العدوى تنتشر إلى أطراف أخرى، ويبدأ الطرف المصاب في التعرض للنخر. قد تصاب بالإنتان. وقد يكون البتر ضروريًا.
moodles.sepsis1dsc: عدوى واسعة النطاق تسبب رد فعل سيئ لجسمك. تشعر بالارتباك وانخفاض ضغط الدم والحمى. مميتة إذا تقدمت.
moodles.sepsis2dsc: ضربات القلب تتسارع، ضغط الدم ينخفض، تشعر بالدوار و الحمى القوية. علامات ضعف الأعضاء. يحتمل أن تصاب قريبا بصدمة إنتانية.
moodles.sepsis3dsc: انخفاض حاد في ضغط الدم ومتلازمة خلل وظائف الأعضاء المتعددة بسبب الإنتان. الموت يقترب بسرعة.
moodles.concussiondsc: فقدت الوعي بسبب انخفاض حيوية رأسك - سوف تستيقظ عندما يشفى رأسك.
moodles.unconsciousdsc: عدم الاستجابة لأي محفزات خارجية. أطفئت الأنوار.
moodles.confused2dsc: مشوش ومرتبك، وتحاول جاهدا استيعاب العالم من حولك.
moodles.confused3dsc: بالكاد واعي، تشعر وكأنك على وشك الانهيار في أي لحظة.
moodles.tired4dsc: بالكاد مستيقظ، على وشك الانهيار من الإرهاق.
moodles.hunger2dsc: جائع بشكل غير مريح، وأضعف قليلاً من المعتاد.
moodles.hunger3dsc: جائع للغاية، تحتاج إلى الشبع، أضعف من المعتاد.
moodles.hunger4dsc: جسدك بأكمله يتدهور... فشل كلي في الأعضاء على وشك الحدوث.
moodles.hunger5dsc: أكلت جيدا اليوم! انخفاض معدل فقدان الوزن وزيادة القدرة على الحركة. زيادة طفيفة في السعادة.
moodles.hunger6dsc: المعدة ممتلئة تماما! إذا تناولت المزيد سوف تشعر بالغثيان. انخفاض كبير في معدل فقدان الوزن والقدرة على الحركة. زيادة السعادة.
moodles.thirst2dsc: انخفاض حجم الماء في الجسم. عطشان جدا.
moodles.thirst3dsc: الجسد يجف، في حاجة ماسة إلى الماء، العطش استولى على عقلك.
moodles.thirst4dsc: الدم يصبح لزجًا بشكل خطير بسبب نقص السوائل. فشل القلب وشيك.
moodles.sick2dsc: مرتبك، وغير مرتاح حول المعدة، معرض للقيء.
moodles.sick3dsc: خامل، متعب، وتعاني من انزعاج شديد. عرضة جدًا للقيء.
moodles.sick4dsc: مريض بشكل خطير. هناك شيء خاطئ للغاية في الداخل. ضعيف، مشوش وفي عالم من الألم.
moodles.hot3dsc: حرارة مرتفعة بخطورة. أنت تكافح من أجل الاستمرار في الحر... والعطش يزداد بشكل كبير.
moodles.hot4dsc: بدأت الخلايا تموت بسبب الحرارة الشديدة. تلف أعضاء لا يمكن إصلاحه على وشك الحدوث.
moodles.cold2dsc: بارد بشكل غير سار، جسدك يتباطأ.
moodles.cold3dsc: درجة الحرارة منخفضة بخطورة، الجسد والعقل تحت تأثير البرد. جسمك بالكامل ينهار ببطء.
moodles.cold4dsc: سوف تنام قريبا ولن تستيقظ أبدا. تصبح على خير.
moodles.underweight2dsc: وزنك قليل بشكل مضر مقارنة بنوعك. أضعف من الطبيعي.
moodles.underweight3dsc: أنت نحيف وضعيف بشكل خطير. أضعف بكثير من المعتاد، وعرضة للتعب والخمول.
moodles.underweight4dsc: أنت نحيف للغاية. يمكنك بسهولة رؤية عظامك والشعور بها من خلال فرائك. معرض لخطر الإصابة بقصور القلب.
moodles.overweight2dsc: وزنك زائد بشكل مضر، مع أنك تبدو في المتوسط ​​مقارنة بالأنواع الأخرى. أنت أخرق، وتتعب بسرعة.
moodles.overweight3dsc: عريض وطري بشكل خطير. أخرق وأكثر عرضة للإرهاق.
moodles.overweight4dsc: السمنة المفرطة تهدد حياتك. تبدو وكأن أحدهم قام بحشو كيس من الفراء بالدهون. معرض لخطر الإصابة بقصور القلب.
moodles.depression2dsc: تفتقر إلى دافع للاستمرار، وتصارع مشاعرك. الأمور حقا لا تبدو جيدة.
moodles.depression3dsc: بالكاد تريد القيام بأي شيء. عقلك مدمر باليأس. ربما سينتهي كل هذا قريبا؟
moodles.depression4dsc: إن لم ينهي هذا المكان حياتك البائسة قريبا، ستقوم أنت بذلك.
moodles.happy3dsc: لقد وجدت السلام في هذه الأرض الغريبة.
moodles.happy4dsc: أنت في قمة العالم، وترسم الطريق إلى الأمام وفقا لإرادتك. لا شيء يستطيع إيقافك!
moodles.autopumpdsc: مستويات الأكسجين والوعي محفوظة عند مستويات مستدامة بواسطة جهاز دعم الحياة. الوقت المتبقي: <>

other.Head: الرأس
other.lootdepthmultiplierdsc: اضرب كمية الغنائم في هذا لكل طبقة
other.trapdepthincreasedsc: زيادة كمية الفخاخ بهذا لكل طبقة
other.inventorytip: اليد الرئيسية (LMB للاستخدام، T للرمي، Q للتبديل):
other.paneltip: إضغط على Escape لفتح/إغلاق هذه اللوحة
other.containerconditionloss: ٪ سوء الحالة في الدقيقة عند الاستخدام
other.injectinfo: امسك للحقنn\تحقق من الملصق للحصول على معلومات الجرعة
other.discretionwarning: هذه اللعبة تحتوي على تصاوير للعنف / إيذاء النفس
other.inventorylisttip: عرض قائمة بجميع العناصر / الحاويات المحمولة
other.combinetip: امسك عنصرين مطابقين في كلتا يديك للجمع بين متانتهماn\ينطبق فقط على العناصر القابلة للدمج

seeGravel: I didn't want to do this...
This looks... Grayer than I anticipated.
'Kay. I need to go... down. Straight down.
Aye! Lets not waste any time.
They really didn't leave anything in my pod...
Atleast I had food and shelter up there...
I'm already missing my peers from up there.
I don't think they can monitor me down here... Right...?
I have to go... Down. Straight down.
I hope I'll get to see my friends again.
It's nice not seeing white tiles around for once...
Wasn't I supposed to get supplies...?
Lets hope I remember my training...
Haven't seen those open in a while.
God. This is going to be fucking horrible.
Go down... Get the thing if I find it... Okay...
eatBad: I think I'm gonna be sick...
Is this some sort of punishment...?
Do I really have to eat this? Ugh.
I don't want to eat that ever again.
Yuck! Get it out of my mouth!
This might make me throw up...
I didn't want to eat this.
What the FUCK am I EATING!?
refuseEat: Why am I even holding this?
What the hell am I thinking?
I'm not putting that IN or ANYWHERE near my mouth.
I'm not letting the intrusive thoughts win.
tired: I could go for a nap.
I should rest my head soon.
Getting rest isn't a bad idea right now...
I kind-of want to lay down.
verytired: It's hard to keep my eyes open...
I feel like I'm about to fall asleep at any moment...
sick: I think I ate something bad...
I should watch what I eat...
I need to watch what I eat...
verysick: I feel sick to my stomach...
My body is aching so bad...
I think I'm about to vomit...
vomit: I can't believe... I'm this sick...
full: Any more and I'll be sick.
I don't want to eat more.
I feel like I'm about to burst.
I'm going to gain weight at this point...
I'm gonna be sick at this rate.
I think I'm gonna throw up...
hungry: Could do with a bite to eat.
I'd devour some dinner right about now.
starving: I'm gonna bite my arm off.
I'm so hungry... I could eat a... uhh... a... uhm...?
I'm starving for a bite to eat.
I feel so weak... I'm hungry...
Uuuugh. I really want a bite to eat.
thirsty: I'd love to quench my thirst.
dehydrated: I need to find... water... fast...
I'm getting dizzy... I need water...
I've been without water too long.
I feel like I'm going shrivel up and die...
limbmuscle: I think I really messed up my <limb>.
Is my <limb> supposed to feel like that?
limbskin: Is my <limb> supposed to look like that?
I need to bandage up my <limb>!
My <limb> feels exposed... I could get infected...
I really tore my fur up...
I need to take care of my <limb>... it looks terrible.
The fur on my <limb>'s all messed up.
Messed my <limb> up real bad... Ouch...
I feel like my <limb> is going to get infected...
Goodness gracious! I appear to have mistaken my calculations and now my <limb> is fully yellow! Oh dear god! What do I do now!
sepsis: Oh god... I feel really bad...
My body is not doing well...
I feel like my entire body is inflamed...
sad: I can do this... I can do this...
Just breathe in, and breathe out...
Getting a little tired of this.
I can't let all of this get to me...
Things are just rough sometimes... Yeah...
I miss any sort of companionship.
I wish I had someone alongside me.
I wish I could find a friend...
I'm starting to feel the isolation.
Is this what my life is going to be now?
gloomy: I hope things get better. Quick.
I have no luck at this point.
I don't like where this is going.
Feeling a bit under the weather.
I wouldn't mind something fun right now.
I need entertainment or something... ugh...
Uugh... I could really use... Anyone, right now.
I wish there was another living soul with me...
I really want out of here.
depressed: I can't take this anymore.
...Why am I trying this?
I should... just... let go...
I can't keep going on like this...
Should I... keep trying?
There's no point to this...
Please... anything to make me feel better...
Can something ease my suffering? Anything?
I just want this to stop.
This is my life now... Great.
I'm too pathetic for this...
This place is going to tear me apart.
I'm not going to make it through this.
What am I going to do...
I'll never get out of this.
Fuck this.
What's even the point anymore.
I can't do this... much longer.
I need something to help me forget this.
I feel. Terrible.
Why did they do this to me?
Who dumped me here, just for me to suffer?...
I wish I could just... understand this more.
I need to distract myself.
I feel genuinely horrible.
DAMN it!
I want to cry...
Maaaannnnn...
I could just lay down and die on the spot.
I'm struggling really bad...
It's... SO lonely in here...
I'm going to fucking kill whoever is putting me through this.
I am going to fucking snap.
I want to smash my head against the wall.
I'm going to claw my fucking eyes out.
I'm starting to want to hurt myself.
Oh... Oh no.
Damn it... DAMN IT!!! Why the FUCK am I HERE???
I pray my death will be swift when it comes.
I'm genuinely starting to consider ending my life.
Don't push me any fucking further.
I don't... I don't want to die here...
Someone... Anyone... Please, help me...
HEEELPPP!!! ANYONE!? PLEASE!!!...
There's no point to this, is there?
All of this is fucking revolting.
Life hates me.
AAAHHH!!
Hahahaha...
miserable: I want to end my life.
I'll do it. I'll do it. I swear.
...Why am I trying this?
End my life.
Kill me. Kill me. Kill me. Please kill me.
I wish not to wake up.
I can't do this. I just can't.
Was I born, to only feel pain?
They won't get away with this.
Make it stop... Make it stop...
I'm. this close.
I need to be high. I need it.
I'm going to end my fucking life.
I am about to FUCKING snap.
I'm not getting this god damned battery if my life depends on it.
I'd rather kill myself than walk another 2 steps.
I'm completely hollow.
This is not worth living through.
I will claw my fucking arteries right out of my damned wrist.
STOP. THIS.
I DON'T WANT TO FUCKING CONTINUE THIS.
I WILL rip out my fucking jugular at this rate.
One more fuckup and I swear I'm going to slit my wrists.
I am so fucking done with all of this.
I'm not willing to walk another step.
I WILL turn myself into a yellow fucking paste.
I'm going to DEVOUR whoever put me here.
Is this a fucking joke?
I'm going to fucking cannibalize myself.
I. Am. Going. To. FUCKING. SNAP.
WHY!?
AAAHHHHHHH!
HEELPPP!!! PLEASE!
THIS IS TOO FUCKING MUCH.
Ahahahah...
Hmph.
Ain't this just fucking lovely?
Mhm.
Okay.
I'm going to end my life.
FUCK. This.
W-what's happening again?
Hahaha...
Ooohhh boy...
It'll all be over soon. I swear.
I fucking DESPISE all of this with every damned fiber of my being.
selfharm: How do yoouuuu like that... Fucker... Ahaha...
Fuck me, hahah... That feels amazing...
Just a little cut... More... Ahahah...
Let's not end this juuuussst yet...
I don't need that flesh... Ggrhh...
Maybe I'll kill myself while at it next time.
suicide: Goodbye. Good FUCKING BYE. I am DONE!!! FUCK ALL OF THIS!
I'm done. Fuck this, fuck me and FUCK you.
I fucking told you. I TOLD you, you piece of shit. I'm DONE!
I'm leaving this shitty world once and for all.
Peace. Bye. Fuck this. I'm fucking leaving. I'm going to hell for this.
I have FUCKING had it with all of this. I am DONE! FUCK OFF!!!
End of the line, fucker. End of the fucking line. I'M OUT!!!
That should do it... Bye-bye... Sorry for this... I hope there's an afterlife for me...
This is the end. I hope whoever finds my corpse makes good use of me. I can't handle this anymore. I'm sorry.
There's no point to this anymore. There NEVER fucking was. I'm ending it all. Fuck me... Fuck ALL of this.
If slitting my wrists doesn't kill me, I'm going to gouge my own fucking eyes out, so I never have to see this horrible land ever again.
I don't know what comes after, but I can finally rest... Let's relax now... There is no need for emotions anymore...
AHHHH! FUCK THIS! ALL OF THIS! I CAN'T TAKE IT ANYMORE! LET ME OUT OF HERE! I'M DONE!
That's it. I've FUCKING had it. I'm finally doing this... Peace. Fucking PEACE. I'm OUT.
I have made the conscious decision to end my life, right here and right now. Farewell, dipshits.
I told you... I TOLD YOU. Piece of shit... Fuck... Burn in the fucking depths of hell.
I'll do better as a rotting corpse. My life ended the moment I was sent here. Goodbye.
This is for fucking EVERYTHING! I'M DONE! AAAHHHH! FUCK ALL OF THIS!
I'm. I'm just... I'm done. No time for suicide notes. I'm so tired of all of this. Goodbye.
N... no hard feelings... right?.. hah... I'm... I'm so tired... G-goodnight...
I'm not doing this anymore. I'm not. It's over. Bye. Ello. Fuck this.
There never was any hope. FUCK. This. I'm OUT! LEAVE ME ALONE! I'M NOT LETTING THIS PLACE TAKE MY LIFE!
Looooook at that... Hahahah... I'm saying goodbye to this fucking universe... Leaving this world behind... It's... Relieving...
There... There it goes... Let's enjoy my last few moments now... Relax and... Fall asleep... One last time...
I hope you're happy with what you've done. Dipshit. Fuck you. FUCK YOU. Go to hell.
There goes my wrist... It's all going to be over soon... Haha...
Fuck you. FUCK you. I'm DONE. I'M FUCKING DONE!
I am LEAVING this fucking place, whether I'm able to or NOT. FUCK YOU.
FUCK this. It's fucking OVER. To hell with my life.
To hell with this. I'm out. Piece of shit. I'm done. I'm done. I'm done. I'm done. I'm done. I'm done. I'm done.
Piece of shit... I'm fucking done... Fuck this...
I'm leaving. I hope I'm not going to hell for this.
They can find me as a desiccated corpse in a ditch. Like it fucking matters.
None of this matters. This is a suicide mission. I'm not fucking going through any more of this.
I've failed. I give up. Fuck this.
Good fucking luck to anyone that comes here after me. Maybe my corpse will be of use to someone. I'm done.
There never was any fucking point to this. I was sent here to die.
They're getting what they fucking wanted.
I didn't think I was ever actually going to do this... Haha... Ahahahaha... Cathartic...
I'm taking my life. Sorry. I can't. I fucking can't take it anymore. I'm so fucking sorry.
I hope I end up in hell. Gonna be better than this fucking place. I can't. I'm out. Sorry. Fuck all of this.
Bye. I'm out. I'll see everyone on the other side, down in the pits of hell.
Fuck this. Fuck this. FUCK. This. I'M DONE! ENOUGH OF THIS.
Sorry. I'm out. Bye. I'm sorry. I'm so fucking sorry. I can't.
bleeding: I'm spilling blood all over the place!
I need to patch myself up!
I appear to be wounded and bleeding.
seecorpse: Fuck me man... That's a bad sight.
No no no no. Oh god...
I hope I won't end up like this.
I knew there were more of us here...
It's gonna be okay... It's gonna be okay.
Someone should give them a proper burial.
God fucking damn it. Ugh. They're dead.
I thought I found someone for a second... Fuck...
How many of us have died here...? God... That's not a nice sight.
I better not end up like this.
Oh damn it. Fuck. I hate that...
I wish I could've given this guy a hug before they passed away.
I want to leave this place... Fuck...
I hope it wasn't painful, at least...
I'm scared I'll meet the same fate...
Oh fuck... That's one of our own... Ooohhh no...
seecorpsedesensitized: There really are a lot of us down here.
I think I'm getting used to the sight.
I think this counts as genocide at this point...
I've seen a lot of these by now.
This place is FILLED with corpses!
I wonder if I'll find someone living in here...
Not a good mortality rate in here.
This place has taken so many lives...
Someone ought to arrange a funeral for 'em...
Every time I see one of us like this, a little piece of my soul breaks off.
I wonder if any of them can be saved.
Hey! You! ...Yeah, they're not any different.
Man, these guys must REALLY not like me... Not a single one even looked at me!
Survival of the fittest, I guess...
I thought I recognized that one for a second...
This is getting boring by now.
I'm astonished how many of us have died here.
It's that time of the day again...
I have a sneaking suspicion this one is dead.
I dont think this guy will need their stuff anymore.
I'd be grave robbing if this guy had a funeral.
...And. That, ladies and gentlemen... Is another corpse.
I don't think they enjoyed their stay.
Ough, you smell! Go take a shower...
Seeing all of these is saddening.
I'd make a joke, but I don't like disrespecting the dead.
seecorpsesuicidal: I'll join you soon.
Not long until I end up like that.
I wish I was in their place.
Everything will end soon.
Maybe I wont be so miserable on the other side.
God, I want to be fucking dead too...
Being a corpse sounds very attractive right about now.
Atleast you managed to escape...
You've found your escape.
I don't blame you.
Any room for me...?
Yeah, fuck this place, buddy. I'll be with you soon enough.
I fucking hate this world.
I'll end up like this soon enough.
This brings me comfort. A reminder that it'll all end soon.
You got lucky.
I wish I was as lucky as you are.
I agree.
Yeah. This is a burden not worth carrying.
I can't wait for when I get the guts to end it.
I'm jealous.
breakcorpse: Why did I do that... Ew...
That's disgusting... I don't want to do that again.
I'd prefer not goring random corpses I find...
There's blood all over me... Ew...
That was one of our own...
Did I HAVE to do that..? Y-yuck...
cold: Is it me or is it cold?
I should try to stay warm.
warm: It's a little hot in here.
I'm starting to sweat a bunch.
I need to chill out- literally.
Something to cool me off would be nice...
hot: My head's dizzy... It's too hot!
I can't think straight with this heat.
I feel sick from this heat...
Something to cool me off would be great!
I'm gonna cook at this rate...
I'm boiling in this heat... ugh.
exerted: I'd like to stop for a moment.
I should stop a bit... I feel all flimsy.
I need to take a moment...
I need a moment to sit.
Let's sit down for a moment.
exhausted: I'm gonna collapse at this rate...
freezing: I'm going to freeze to death...
I'm too cold... way too cold...
I need to get warm- now...
Anything... to warm me up... please...
I need to get to somewhere warm.
emaciated: I am so thin... I feel weak.
I REALLY need to pack on a few kilos.
This kind of weight loss might end very badly for me at this point.
I really need to eat more...
I'm way too skinny... This can't be good for me.
I'm like a low calorie diet drink.
obese: I feel so heavy and sluggish.
I need to drop a few kilos.
I can see the fat building up on me...
I can't continue eating this much.
opiated: This can't be good for me but I feel great.
What did I just put into my body...
I feel like something's in my lungs...
It's a bit hard to breathe...
I feel like I'm gonna pass out... And I love it...
I want more of whatever this is...
opiatedsad: I just need to relax... I just need to relax...
This'll calm me down... this'll... oogh...
I need to stop thinking... stop thinking...
Just to... Get my mind off of these things...
Clear my mind... clear my mind...
opiateend: Awh... it's starting to wear off, I think.
I think I'm losing my buzz.
That euphoria wore off... I feel worse.
I'm starting to feel... worse again...
I'm feeling bad... I think that wore off.
It's wearing off... I feel sorta sluggish.
That high is wearing off... I feel bad.
I think my high is over.
Ohh... it's wearing off... I feel tired.
It's wearing off... Wish I could stay like that forever...
I think I'm coming back to normality...
opiateendsad: Back to reality...
No... please... come back...
